task.title: Viewing secrets
task.shortdesc: The get command can be used to list secrets and view their contents.

step.cmd: To view a list of all secrets, run the following command.
step.info: If a namepace is beign used, the -n argument must be inclued. kubectl get secrets -n namespace_name
where namespace_name is the name of the namespace.

step.cmd: To view the content of a secret, run the following command.
step.info: kubectl describe secret secret_name where secret_name is the name of the secret.
